Smart Backpack: A backpack with a built-in smart system that can charge your devices, monitor your health, and even provide personalized recommendations for your daily routine.
Virtual Reality Backpack: A backpack that allows you to experience virtual reality on the go.
Modular Backpack: A backpack with interchangeable modules that can be customized to suit your needs.
Self-Cleaning Backpack: A backpack with a built-in self-cleaning system that removes dirt and stains.
Shape-Shifting Backpack: A backpack that can change its shape to adapt to your needs.
